title: Gamification-Based Science Learning Effectiveness Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific terminology comprehension and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Conducting smartphone-based learning in limited technology environments, utilizing 10-minute microlearning modules

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core science concepts through gamification elements.
Learners improve self-directed learning abilities by achieving over 80% weekly mission completion rates.
Learners record at least three weekly interactions with peer learners based on leaderboard feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
